batteries.name: Mini Tubular Battery
batteries.description: Compact lead-acid tubular battery for minimal energy storage needs.

batteries.name: Tubular Lead-Acid Battery
batteries.description: Lead-acid tubular battery, cost-effective for rural use.

batteries.name: Gel Battery (VRLA)
batteries.description: A sealed lead-acid battery that uses a gelled electrolyte. It's a step up from tubular, offering a maintenance-free design that is spill-proof and vibration-resistant.
batteries.best_for: Off-grid systems, telecoms, and installations where regular maintenance is difficult.
pros: Good performance in deep cycle applications
cons: Lower power output than AGM batteries

batteries.name: OPzV Battery
batteries.description: OPzV (Ortsfeste Panzerplatten Versiegelt) is a top-tier battery combining durable tubular plates with a maintenance-free gel electrolyte. It is designed for maximum lifespan and reliability in critical applications.
batteries.best_for: Industrial-scale solar, telecom towers, data centers, and critical infrastructure where long-term reliability is essential.
pros: Very high number of charge cycles

batteries.name: Lithium-Ion Battery
batteries.description: Advanced lithium-ion battery for reliable energy storage.

solarPanels.name: Polycrystalline Panel
solarPanels.description: A cost-effective and reliable solar panel, easily recognizable by its blue, marbled appearance. A good choice for large, open spaces where maximum efficiency isn't the top priority.

solarPanels.description: High-efficiency panels for maximum power output.
